name: Reishi
description: The Reishi (Ganoderma lucidum), also known as Lingzhi, is one of the most important medicinal mushrooms worldwide. In Traditional Chinese Medicine it has been revered for over 2000 years as the 'Mushroom of Immortality'. It produces polysaccharides and triterpenoids with immunomodulating, antitumoral and hepatoprotective properties. The characteristically red-lacquered fruiting body grows on hardwoods.
